column4: i want to create a .htaccess file, no problems, but I'm having issues saving it. i tried using 'vi .htaccess' but that tool seems to lack the edit option, think i need to download the full version. what other command line edit tool can I use?
sounds like you don't have the necessary rights to save into the directory
when vi opens, it wont go to edit mode, usually I type 'ESC - I' but that does nothing, not a permission issue
